attributes.action: tighten the benefit rules for polygamous marriages.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
under islamic law you can have four wifes at any given time, this is called polygamous marriages, these marriages should be illegal as this is aform of bigamy.
under the benefit rules the husband can claim benefits for all of the wifes this is not fair as BRITISH citizens are not aloud to have  polygamous marriages.
